description: System-generated unique ID of this customized column definition.
Identifier of the customization profile or layout that this column definition belongs to.
Internal field key being customized; used by the application to map data to this column.
Sequence number controlling the display order of the column within its section or layout.
User-facing caption displayed for the column in forms, grids, or reports.
Boolean flag indicating the column should use a wider layout span than standard.
Configured number of visible text rows for this field. 0 uses the default.
Name of the functional section or group this column appears under within the customization.
Value prepopulated in the field when creating or editing records under this customization.
Username or ID of the user who created this column configuration.
Timestamp when this column configuration was created (system timezone).
Username or ID of the user who last modified this column configuration.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this column configuration.
JSON configuration providing advanced properties or overrides for this field; may control behavior, validation, or presentation.
Flag indicating whether the column is displayed to users under this customization.
Flag indicating this record represents a section header or group rather than a data field.
Flag indicating whether this field is included for offline use in the mobile app; likely controls sync behavior; confirm with SME.
